{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Function}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Function = Callable&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; Typed&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Function}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects a function, excluding constructors and destructors.
